name: Leander "Lee" Stinson
bio: When Leander Lee Stinson was born in 1824, in South Carolina, United States, his father, Andrew Stinson, was 32 and his mother, Elizabeth Stringfellow, was 33. He married Nancy Lynn Pinkerton Burkett? in 1845, in Butler, Alabama, United States. They were the parents of at least 4 sons and 1 daughter. He lived in Butler, Alabama, United States for about 10 years. In 1850, at the age of 26, his occupation is listed as farmer in Butler, Alabama, United States. He died on 11 February 1865, in Elmira, Chemung, New York, United States, at the age of 41, and was buried in Woodlawn National Cemetery, Elmira, Chemung, New York, United States.
